post_text: March 17, 2016 at 2:50 PM#1Is there a command line syntax to open the Cloning window?

posts.post_text: March 17, 2016 at 2:50 PM#1Is there a command line syntax to open the Cloning window?

posts.author: Duplicate Ryan Kanarek
posts.post_text: March 18, 2016 at 3:39 AM#2Not as far as I know, but if you do a clone through the command line without any filtering (i.e. without using If) then the menu will open with that selection in it. Does that help?

title: Open Cloning Window syntax?
